content.chorus:
Are you washed, are you washed,
In the blood, in the blood.
In the soul cleansing blood of the Lamb? Of the Lamb?
Are your garments spotless?
Are they washed as snow?
Are you 
washed in the blood of the Lamb?
verses:
Have you been to Jesus for the cleansing
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb
Are you fully trusting in His grace this hou
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb

Are you walking daily by the Saviour's side?
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?
Do you rest each moment in the Crucified?
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?

When the bridegroom cometh will your robes be white?
Are you washed in the Blood of the Lamb?
Will your soul be ready for the mansion's bright
And be washed in the blood o9f the Lamb

Lay aside the garments that are stained with sin,
And be washed in the blood of the Lamb;
There is a fountain flowing for the soul unclean,
O be washed in the blood of the Lamb
